# Random Facts About Cats

 A simple web application that displays some random facts about cats from the
 [meowfacts](https://github.com/wh-iterabb-it/meowfacts) API.

You can try it on at [random-facts-about-cats](https://lowkaze.github.io/random-facts-about-cats/).
